summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4130 for the improvement of 35th Avenue Southwest, from West Kenyon Street to West Barton Street; by the construction of watermains together with fire hydrants and the necessary appurtenances and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 49465, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
